§l§2Game Modes§r

There are 2 modes to play:

-§lLine Mode§r: classic BINGO, just one line to win (horizontal, vertical, or diagonal). Type §c$mode line§r in chat to set this game mode.

-§lBlackout Mode§r: you will need to fill the whole card to win. Type §c$mode blackout§r in chat to set this game mode.

If no mode is selected when starting the game, §lLine Mode§r will be the default mode.

§l§2Bingo Card§r

-Every player gets a Bingo Card item when joining the world. This item can't be dropped nor lost on death.

-Before the game starts, §lusing§r the item creates a new card. Repeat this until you are happy with it.

Once the game has started, you won't be able to change it, so choose wisely.


-After the game has started, §lusing§r the item let you hide or show your card from the screen.

§l§2Game§r

-To start the game, type §c$startgame§r in chat. All players will get spread out around the world.

-Everytime you get an item that is in your card, it will be marked out, and the item will be taken from your inventory.

§o§7(TIP: if you are quick enough, you might be able to equip armor without loosing it towards your card.)§r

-Once someone gets Bingo, the game will alert everyone that there is a winner, and will teleport everyone back to spawn.
